Global Health Facts : Some 2 billion people—one-third of the world's population—are thought to be infected with TB bacteria.

Webnotes

As you watch the video, keep a journal of your thoughts to refer to in follow-up discussions about the Forum. You only have to enter your name and email once but you can submit your notes often. After you watch, we’ll email your notes to you. This will not interrupt the video.

Note: Webnotes no longer available.

News & Events

11.22.2006

World AIDS Week

In commemoration of World AIDS Day on December 1st, the World AIDS Day task force sponosred by the CSC will be hosting a week of events that focus on increasing awareness for HIV/AIDS among Notre Dame students and faculty.
